{"blocks":[{"key":"dp620","text":"Create an Excel file (*.xlsx ONLY) or regular (not pipe-delimited) comma-separated value (CSV) file using the requirements described above. Note: When using Excel for either file format, the row number indicated by Excel is 2 rows off from the rows as numbered by ReSciColl. ReSciColl does not count the header row (with column names), so the first row of metadata (row 2 in Excel) is considered row 0 in ReSciColl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5048","text":"After creating/updating your collection, navigate to the ReSciColl home page. The collection itself must be created/updated first to then hold all the items in the collection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5pgct","text":"Click the “Upload New Items” button under “Item Management.”","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8lva6","text":"Login to ReSciColl with your username and password (Fig. I-1). USGS and other Department of Interior users should click the “Login with BisonConnect” button, while external users should select “Login with login.gov.” If you need assistance obtaining a login.gov account, contact login.gov via their website. Contact NGGDPP with your login.gov username once you have obtained an account. If you need further assistance logging into ReSciColl, contact NGGDPP.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64pkk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqcj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"32rej","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":827,"id":436102,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"4isl1\",\"text\":\"Figure I-1: Login screen for ReSciColl item ingest tool.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj6icaja7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj6gcaja7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj6hcaja7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj6fcaja7.webp","width":522}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2sf1b","text":"On the “Collection and Item Management” window that loads next (Fig. I-2), click “Upload New Items.”","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7pe4d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61alh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"68du0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":278,"id":436106,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"djeld\",\"text\":\"Figure I-2: ReSciColl Collection and Item Management screen.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj6ncaja7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj6kcaja7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj6mcaja7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj6jcaja7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ceqvs","text":"Under “Choose a Collection,” from the drop-down list (Fig. I-3), select the collection to which you want to add items, and when you have chosen the correct collection, select “Yes” in the “Is this the correct collection?” section.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91uds","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4us5e","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1afhd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":264,"id":436110,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"e9k6a\",\"text\":\"Figure I-3: ReSciColl Item Management collection selector drop-down menu.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj6scaja7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj6qcaja7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj6rcaja7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj6pcaja7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e49vk","text":"Under “Validate Your CSV,” select “Choose File,” browse for the item metadata file you wish to upload, verify it is the correct file, and click “Validate” (Fig. I-4).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55ue1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bijic","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"19k29","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":362,"id":436114,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"f63d9\",\"text\":\"Figure I-4: ReSciColl Item Management collection verification dialog and item metadata file selector.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj6wcaja7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj6ucaja7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj6vcaja7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj6tcaja7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fn3rh","text":"ReSciColl will validate the uploaded metadata file. If there are errors, you can fix them and try again by clicking the “Errors Fixed” button that will appear. If you have issues understanding and/or correcting the errors, contact NGGDPP for assistance. Once the file is correctly validated, you should see a success message (Fig. I-5).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"daf47","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bubio","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5vrhs","text":"Notes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8b5o9","text":"When uploading item metadata to a ReSciColl collection, ReSciColl creates a web page for each item (Fig. I-6). The CSV or XLSX file that was uploaded is transferred to the ScienceBase archive page for the collection as an attached file, and it may be accessed there. Individual “child” item pages are no longer created in ScienceBase.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"vcq2","text":"If you have already uploaded items to the selected collection, ReSciColl uses the “localID” field in the item metadata CSV or XLSX file to determine whether or not an item already exists. If it finds a localID that matches, it updates that item. If it does not find a match, it adds the item to the collection.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4sgnn","text":"If you need to {"blocks":[{"key":"2aame","text":"If you listed attached files in the item metadata template, you may now upload those via the attachment dialog box (Fig. I-7). ReSciColl only accepts attachment uploads as a single file of 299 MB or smaller. For multiple attachments, a Zip file is required. If the total size of a Zip file of all your attachments is larger than 299 MB, you will need to upload the Zip files one at a time. ReSciColl will prompt you for each file. If your attachments are too large for these limits, please contact NGGDPP for assistance and possible alternatives.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4t2cq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ueqb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6311j","text":"Repeat the process for each separate collection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":363,"id":436126,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"95o7c\",\"text\":\"Figure I-7: ReSciColl Item Management screen with file attachment selector.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj7acaja7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj68caja7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj69caja7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pj67caja7.webp","width":550}}}}
